Interface ClauseListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SolverComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ClauseListener
extends SolverComponent
    module that listens to add/removal of clauses

    4.7
    Author:
    Simon Cruanes and Radoslaw Szymanek
